blocks.name: ctopon
blocks.content: Syntax for the function of topologies on sets.
blocks.origin: const class ctopon { TopOn }

blocks.name: diff.ctopon.s
diff.ctopon.c
diff.ctopon.w
df-topon
blocks.content: Define the function that associates with a set the set of topologies on it. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: istopon
blocks.content: Property of being a topology with a given base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm istopon(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(c1, cuni(c0))))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(c1, cuni(c0))), wcel(c1, universe))
  elfvex(c0, ctopon, c1)
  imp(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(c1, cuni(c0)), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(c1, cuni(c0)), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
  uniexg(c0, ctop)
  eleq1(c1, cuni(c0), universe)
  syl6bb(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(c1, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c1, cuni(cv(hs0))))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1), crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c1, cuni(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvmpt3i(hs1, c1, universe, ctopon, crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c1, cuni(cv(hs0)))), crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0)))))
  rabbidv(hs0, ctop, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0))), wceq(c1, cuni(cv(hs0))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs1), c1, cuni(cv(hs0)))
  df-topon(hs1, hs0)
  ssexi(crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0)))), cpw(cpw(cv(hs1))))
  pwex(cpw(cv(hs1)))
  vpwex(hs1)
  mprgbir(hs0, ctop, wss(crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0)))), cpw(cpw(cv(hs1)))), wi(wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(cv(hs1))))))
  rabss(hs0, ctop, cpw(cpw(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0))))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), ctop), wi(wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(cv(hs1))))))
  sylibr(wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(cv(hs1)))), wss(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(hs1))))
  syl5sseqr(cv(hs0), cpw(cv(hs1)), cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0))))
  pwuni(cv(hs0))
  pweq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0)))
  selpw(hs0, cpw(cv(hs1)))
  elrab(hs0, c0, ctop, wceq(c1, cuni(cv(hs0))), wceq(c1, cuni(c0)))
  eqeq2d(c1, cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c1, cuni(cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cpw(cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c1, cuni(c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm istopon(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 = ‚ãÉ c0))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 = ‚ãÉ c0), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  elfvex(c0, ctopon, c1)
  imp(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 = ‚ãÉ c0, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5ibrcom(c0 ‚àà Top, c1 = ‚ãÉ c0, c1 ‚àà ùïå, ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  uniexg(c0, ctop)
  eleq1(c1, ‚ãÉ c0, universe)
  syl6bb(c1 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 = ‚ãÉ c0), c0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà Top | c1 = ‚ãÉ hs0 })
  eleq2d(c0, (TopOn ` c1), { hs0 ‚àà Top | c1 = ‚ãÉ hs0 }, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt3i(hs1, c1, universe, ctopon, { hs0 ‚àà Top | c1 = ‚ãÉ hs0 }, { hs0 ‚àà Top | hs1 = ‚ãÉ hs0 })
  rabbidv(hs0, ctop, hs1 = c1, hs1 = ‚ãÉ hs0, c1 = ‚ãÉ hs0)
  eqeq1(hs1, c1, ‚ãÉ hs0)
  df-topon(hs1, hs0)
  ssexi({ hs0 ‚àà Top | hs1 = ‚ãÉ hs0 }, P(P(hs1)))
  pwex(P(hs1))
  vpwex(hs1)
  mprgbir(hs0, ctop, { hs0 ‚àà Top | hs1 = ‚ãÉ hs0 } ‚äÜ P(P(hs1)), (hs1 = ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà P(P(hs1))))
  rabss(hs0, ctop, P(P(hs1)), hs1 = ‚ãÉ hs0)
  a1i(hs0 ‚àà Top, (hs1 = ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà P(P(hs1))))
  sylibr(hs1 = ‚ãÉ hs0, hs0 ‚àà P(P(hs1)), hs0 ‚äÜ P(hs1))
  syl5sseqr(hs0, P(hs1), P(‚ãÉ hs0), hs1 = ‚ãÉ hs0)
  pwuni(hs0)
  pweq(hs1, ‚ãÉ hs0)
  selpw(hs0, P(hs1))
  elrab(hs0, c0, ctop, c1 = ‚ãÉ hs0, c1 = ‚ãÉ c0)
  eqeq2d(c1, ‚ãÉ hs0, ‚ãÉ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c({ hs0 ‚àà Top | c1 = ‚ãÉ hs0 })
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 = c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(P(P(hs1)))
  diff.hs0.c(P(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 = ‚ãÉ c0)
}

blocks.name: topontop
blocks.content: A topology on a given base set is a topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: toponuni
blocks.content: The base set of a topology on a given base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: topontopi
blocks.content: A topology on a given base set is a topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: toponunii
blocks.content: The base set of a topology on a given base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: toptopon
blocks.content: Alternative definition of ` Top ` in terms of ` TopOn ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: toptopon2
blocks.content: A topology is the same thing as a topology on the union of its open sets. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: topontopon
blocks.content: A topology on a set is a topology on the union of its open sets. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: funtopon
blocks.content: The class ` TopOn ` is a function. (Contributed by BJ, 29-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: toponrestid
blocks.content: Given a topology on a set, restricting it to that same set has no effect. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 6-Jul-2022.)

blocks.name: toponsspwpw
blocks.content: The set of topologies on a set is included in the double power set of that set. (Contributed by BJ, 29-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm toponsspwpw(class c0) {
  |- wss(cfv(ctopon, c0), cpw(cpw(c0)))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wss(cfv(ctopon, c0), cpw(cpw(c0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl6eqss(cfv(ctopon, c0), cpw(cpw(c0)), crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c0, cuni(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cfv(ctopon, c0), crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))))), wcel(crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c0, cuni(cv(hs0)))), universe))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c0, cuni(cv(hs0)))), universe), wss(crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c0, cuni(cv(hs0)))), cpw(cpw(c0))), wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), universe))
  pwexd(cpw(c0), universe, wcel(c0, universe))
  pwexg(c0, universe)
  ssexg(crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c0, cuni(cv(hs0)))), cpw(cpw(c0)), universe)
  fvmptg(hs1, c0, universe, crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c0, cuni(cv(hs0)))), universe, ctopon, crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0)))))
  rabbidv(hs0, ctop, wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cuni(cv(hs0))), wceq(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs1), c0, cuni(cv(hs0)))
  df-topon(hs1, hs0)
  sstri(crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c0, cuni(cv(hs0)))), cpw(cpw(c0)), cab(hs0, wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)))
  sseqtri(crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c0, cuni(cv(hs0)))), cab(hs0, wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), cab(hs0, wceq(c0, cuni(cv(hs0)))))
  rabssab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))))
  abbii(hs0, wceq(c0, cuni(cv(hs0))), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))
  eqcom(c0, cuni(cv(hs0)))
  pwpwssunieq(hs0, c0)
  syl6eqss(cfv(ctopon, c0), cpw(cpw(c0)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, ctopon)
  0ss(cpw(cpw(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, ctop, wceq(c0, cuni(cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm toponsspwpw(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (TopOn ` c0)‚äÜ P(P(c0))
} = {
  pm2.61i((TopOn ` c0)‚äÜ P(P(c0)), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6eqss((TopOn ` c0), P(P(c0)), { hs0 ‚àà Top | c0 = ‚ãÉ hs0 }, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  mpdan(c0 ‚àà ùïå, (TopOn ` c0)= { hs0 ‚àà Top | c0 = ‚ãÉ hs0 }, { hs0 ‚àà Top | c0 = ‚ãÉ hs0 } ‚àà ùïå)
  sylancr(c0 ‚àà ùïå, { hs0 ‚àà Top | c0 = ‚ãÉ hs0 } ‚àà ùïå, { hs0 ‚àà Top | c0 = ‚ãÉ hs0 } ‚äÜ P(P(c0)), P(P(c0))‚àà ùïå)
  pwexd(P(c0), universe, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  pwexg(c0, universe)
  ssexg({ hs0 ‚àà Top | c0 = ‚ãÉ hs0 }, P(P(c0)), universe)
  fvmptg(hs1, c0, universe, { hs0 ‚àà Top | c0 = ‚ãÉ hs0 }, universe, ctopon, { hs0 ‚àà Top | hs1 = ‚ãÉ hs0 })
  rabbidv(hs0, ctop, hs1 = c0, hs1 = ‚ãÉ hs0, c0 = ‚ãÉ hs0)
  eqeq1(hs1, c0, ‚ãÉ hs0)
  df-topon(hs1, hs0)
  sstri({ hs0 ‚àà Top | c0 = ‚ãÉ hs0 }, P(P(c0)), { hs0 | ‚ãÉ hs0 = c0 })
  sseqtri({ hs0 ‚àà Top | c0 = ‚ãÉ hs0 }, { hs0 | ‚ãÉ hs0 = c0 }, { hs0 | c0 = ‚ãÉ hs0 })
  rabssab(hs0, ctop, c0 = ‚ãÉ hs0)
  abbii(hs0, c0 = ‚ãÉ hs0, ‚ãÉ hs0 = c0)
  eqcom(c0, ‚ãÉ hs0)
  pwpwssunieq(hs0, c0)
  syl6eqss((TopOn ` c0), P(P(c0)), emptycls, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c0, ctopon)
  0ss(P(P(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c({ hs0 ‚àà Top | c0 = ‚ãÉ hs0 })
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 = c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
}

blocks.name: dmtopon
blocks.content: The domain of ` TopOn ` is ` _V ` . (Contributed by BJ, 29-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmtopon() {
  |- wceq(cdm(ctopon), universe)
} = {
  dmmpti(hs0, ctopon, universe, crab(hs1, ctop, wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1)))))
  ssexi(crab(hs1, ctop, wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1)))), cpw(cpw(cv(hs0))))
  pwex(cpw(cv(hs0)))
  vpwex(hs0)
  eqsstri(crab(hs1, ctop, wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1)))), cpw(cpw(cv(hs0))), crab(hs1, ctop, wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  rabbii(hs1, ctop, wceq(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1))), wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))
  eqcom(cv(hs0), cuni(cv(hs1)))
  sstri(crab(hs1, ctop, wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), cpw(cpw(cv(hs0))), cab(hs1, wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  rabssab(hs1, ctop, wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))
  pwpwssunieq(hs1, cv(hs0))
  df-topon(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dmtopon() {
  ‚ä¢ dom(TopOn)= ùïå
} = {
  dmmpti(hs0, ctopon, universe, { hs1 ‚àà Top | hs0 = ‚ãÉ hs1 })
  ssexi({ hs1 ‚àà Top | hs0 = ‚ãÉ hs1 }, P(P(hs0)))
  pwex(P(hs0))
  vpwex(hs0)
  eqsstri({ hs1 ‚àà Top | hs0 = ‚ãÉ hs1 }, P(P(hs0)), { hs1 ‚àà Top | ‚ãÉ hs1 = hs0 })
  rabbii(hs1, ctop, hs0 = ‚ãÉ hs1, ‚ãÉ hs1 = hs0)
  eqcom(hs0, ‚ãÉ hs1)
  sstri({ hs1 ‚àà Top | ‚ãÉ hs1 = hs0 }, P(P(hs0)), { hs1 | ‚ãÉ hs1 = hs0 })
  rabssab(hs1, ctop, ‚ãÉ hs1 = hs0)
  pwpwssunieq(hs1, hs0)
  df-topon(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}

blocks.name: fntopon
blocks.content: The class ` TopOn ` is a function with domain ` _V ` . Analogue for topologies of ~ fnmre for Moore collections. (Contributed by BJ, 29-Apr-2021.)

blocks.name: toprntopon
blocks.content: A topology is the same thing as a topology on a set (variable-free version). (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm toprntopon() {
  |- wceq(ctop, cuni(crn(ctopon)))
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, ctop, cuni(crn(ctopon)))
  bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(crn(ctopon))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), crn(ctopon)))))
  impbii(wcel(cv(hs0), ctop), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), crn(ctopon)))))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs0), ctop), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), crn(ctopon)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0)))))
  toptopon2(cv(hs0))
  spcev(hs1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), crn(ctopon))))
  fvex(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0)))
  syl6bb(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), crn(ctopon))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0))), crn(ctopon))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), crn(ctopon)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0))), crn(ctopon)))
  eleq2(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0))), cv(hs0))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0))), crn(ctopon))
  impbii(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0))), crn(ctopon))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0)))))
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0))), crn(ctopon)))
  jctr(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0))), crn(ctopon)))
  mp2an(wcel(cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0))), crn(ctopon)), wfn(ctopon, universe), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), universe))
  fntopon()
  vuniex(hs0)
  fnfvelrn(ctopon, universe, cuni(cv(hs0)))
  exlimiv(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), crn(ctopon))), wcel(cv(hs0), ctop))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), crn(ctopon))), wcel(cv(hs0), ctop), wex(hs2, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2)))))
  sylan2(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), crn(ctopon)), wex(hs2, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2)))), wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2)))))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs1), crn(ctopon)), wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2)))), wrex(hs2, cdm(ctopon), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wcel(cv(hs1), crn(ctopon)), wrex(hs2, cdm(ctopon), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2))))), wfun(ctopon))
  funtopon()
  elrnrexdm(hs2, ctopon, cv(hs1))
  rexex(hs2, cdm(ctopon), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2))))
  sylbir(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wex(hs2, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2))))), wex(hs2, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2)))), wex(hs2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2))))))
  19.42v(hs2, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2))))
  eximi(hs2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2))))
  impcom(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2))))
  sseld(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2))))
  eqimss(cv(hs1), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2)))
  exlimiv(hs2, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs0), ctop))
  topontop(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))
  eluni(hs1, cv(hs0), crn(ctopon))
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(crn(ctopon)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0))))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctopon, cuni(cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), ctop))
  diff.hs2.c(ctopon)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(cv(hs0), ctop))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(crn(ctopon))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm toprntopon() {
  ‚ä¢ Top = ‚ãÉ ran(TopOn)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, ctop, ‚ãÉ ran(TopOn))
  bitr4i(hs0 ‚àà Top, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(TopOn), ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ran(TopOn))))
  impbii(hs0 ‚àà Top, ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ran(TopOn))))
  sylbi(hs0 ‚àà Top, ‚àÉ(hs1,(hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ran(TopOn))), hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0))
  toptopon2(hs0)
  spcev(hs1, (TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0), hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0), (hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ran(TopOn)))
  fvex(ctopon, ‚ãÉ hs0)
  syl6bb(hs1 =(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0), (hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ran(TopOn)), hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0), (hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0)‚àß(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0)‚àà ran(TopOn)))
  anbi12d(hs1 =(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0), hs0 ‚àà hs1, hs1 ‚àà ran(TopOn), hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0), (TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0)‚àà ran(TopOn))
  eleq2(hs1, (TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0), hs0)
  eleq1(hs1, (TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0), ran(TopOn))
  impbii((hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0)‚àß(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0)‚àà ran(TopOn)), hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0))
  simpl(hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0), (TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0)‚àà ran(TopOn))
  jctr(hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0), (TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0)‚àà ran(TopOn))
  mp2an((TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0)‚àà ran(TopOn), TopOn[Fn]ùïå, ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fntopon()
  vuniex(hs0)
  fnfvelrn(ctopon, universe, ‚ãÉ hs0)
  exlimiv(hs1, (hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ran(TopOn)), hs0 ‚àà Top)
  syl((hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ran(TopOn)), hs0 ‚àà Top, ‚àÉ(hs2, hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` hs2)))
  sylan2(hs0 ‚àà hs1, hs1 ‚àà ran(TopOn), ‚àÉ(hs2, hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` hs2)), ‚àÉ(hs2, hs1 =(TopOn ` hs2)))
  syl(hs1 ‚àà ran(TopOn), ‚àÉ(hs2, hs1 =(TopOn ` hs2)), ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà dom(TopOn), hs1 =(TopOn ` hs2)))
  ax-mp((hs1 ‚àà ran(TopOn)‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs2 ‚àà dom(TopOn), hs1 =(TopOn ` hs2))), Fun(TopOn))
  funtopon()
  elrnrexdm(hs2, ctopon, hs1)
  rexex(hs2, dom(TopOn), hs1 =(TopOn ` hs2))
  sylbir((hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚àß ‚àÉ(hs2, hs1 =(TopOn ` hs2))), ‚àÉ(hs2, hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` hs2)), ‚àÉ(hs2,(hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚àß hs1 =(TopOn ` hs2))))
  19.42v(hs2, hs0 ‚àà hs1, hs1 =(TopOn ` hs2))
  eximi(hs2, (hs0 ‚àà hs1 ‚àß hs1 =(TopOn ` hs2)), hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` hs2))
  impcom(hs0 ‚àà hs1, hs1 =(TopOn ` hs2), hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` hs2))

  eqimss(hs1, (TopOn ` hs2))
  exlimiv(hs2, hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` hs2), hs0 ‚àà Top)
  topontop(hs0, hs2)
  eluni(hs1, hs0, ran(TopOn))
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ ran(TopOn))
  diff.hs1.c((TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ hs0))

blocks.name: toponmax
blocks.content: The base set of a topology is an open set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: toponss
blocks.content: A member of a topology is a subset of its underlying set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: toponcom
blocks.content: If ` K ` is a topology on the base set of topology ` J ` , then ` J ` is a topology on the base of ` K ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: toponcomb
blocks.content: Biconditional form of ~ toponcom . (Contributed by BJ, 5-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: topgele
blocks.content: The topologies over the same set have the greatest element (the discrete topology) and the least element (the indiscrete topology). (Contributed by FL, 18-Apr-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm topgele(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wa(wss(cpr(emptycls, c1), c0), wss(c0, cpw(c1))))
} = {
  jca(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(cpr(emptycls, c1), c0), wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
  prssd(emptycls, c1, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wcel(c0, ctop))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  0opn(c0)
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(cuni(c0), c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(cuni(c0), c1), wceq(c1, cuni(c0)))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  eqimss2(c1, cuni(c0))
  sspwuni(c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm topgele(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚Üí({ ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚äÜ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ P(c1)))
} = {
  jca(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), { ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚äÜ c0, c0 ‚äÜ P(c1))
  prssd(emptycls, c1, c0, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1))
  syl(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, c0 ‚àà Top)
  topontop(c0, c1)
  0opn(c0)
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  sylibr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c0 ‚äÜ P(c1), ‚ãÉ c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), ‚ãÉ c0 ‚äÜ c1, c1 = ‚ãÉ c0)
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  eqimss2(c1, ‚ãÉ c0)
  sspwuni(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: topsn
blocks.content: The only topology on a singleton is the discrete topology (which is also the indiscrete topology by ~ pwsn ). (Contributed by FL, 5-Jan-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2015.)
